title: Gorgeous spacious 5 room 2nd floor apt with bedroom plus office
posting_body: Spacious gorgeous updated second floor 5 room one bedroom plus large open office with private deck gets great natural light from all sides and has ornate woodwork, hardwood floors, thermal windows, eat in kitchen with granite counters and stainless appliances, formal dining room, large living room and bedroom is large with a huge closet.
In unit laundry, central ac, thermal windows.
In greystone with private locked storage for bikes and out of season items.
Great corner store plus coffee shops and restaurant nearby and a short walk to the Park.
Credit and rental history application fee is $25 per adult and can be applied to first month's rent.
Good established credit (minimum 700 score) and good rental references required.
$1795 security deposit is due at the signing of the lease.
Pet policy: One mature cat will be considered with a refundable deposit which will be held as extra security deposit.
